{"name": "","description": "String length should be limited to avoid an attacker to send very long strings to your service. You can do this in different ways: - specify a `maxLength` - constraint the possible values with an `enum` - use a constrained `format` like `date` or `date-time`. A constrained string using the `date` format. For further security, you can always limit string length even in conjunction with `format` and `pattern`."}
